abstract.para: This procedure includes the steps to install the base Linux operating system and a &kube; distribution for users who start deploying on cluster nodes from scratch. If you already have a &kube; cluster installed and running, you can skip this procedure and continue with .

step.para: Install and register a supported Linux operating system on each cluster node. We recommend using &sls;, or, alternatively, &slm; for an immutable operating system. For a list of supported operating systems, refer to .
